 1997-19801997-12-190,  FIN,  NR,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRequest the AUDITOR GENERAL to examine whether the requirement set out in section 233.3 of the Income Tax Act to report foreign property over $100,000 is the appropriate mechanism to enhance compliance with the law; to examine alternative mechanisms to the reporting requirement to ensure that Canadian residents voluntarily report their world-wide income; to consider the broader implications of the reporting requirement, including privacy, economic and investments issues; and to report to the House of Commons, the Minister of Finance and the Minister of National Revenue on the said matters.
